title: Did not get Re-Roll rewards
body: Hey so I re-rolled three champion shards to a perm. It said I got Sona and it added it to my inventory, my friend just got an S on sona and I did not receive the crate and when I look at my owned champions it says that I do not own sona, even tho it told me I got her Perm shard in the Re-Roll.

replies.body:
I don't see anything on your account that would prevent you from using Sona. Can you restart your client to see if she shows up? 

Additionally, you would only earn a chest had you been playing a champion you hadn't already earned a chest while playing this season. [Our FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) properly addresses the eligibility for Hextech Chests.

Let me know if anything changes.

I totally forgot that, my apologies on the playing her part, and I logged in today and shes available now, it had a brief delay tho when I clicked on her. First it said she was unavailable but froze and said shes owned.  Thanks for answering me!
